CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 1, 1941, pg. 9 reads: "The fourth wedding anniversary of Mr. and Mrs. Alvin Davis was celebrated by a party given in their honor by the daughters' parents. Mr. and Mrs. C. L. Bolyer, Saturday, February 22.  Left to right: Mrs. Pauline Bolyer, Mrs. Marjorie Schoeder of Jersey City, (houseguest of Mr. and Mrs. A. Davis), Alvin Davis, Mrs. Alvin Davis, Miss Dorothy Sandish [Sandidge], Mrs. Julia Harris, Carl Bolyer and Miss Sylvia Y. Davis,daughter of the Davises. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left: Pauline Bolyer, Marjorie Schoeder, Alvin Davis, Mrs. Davis, Dorothy "Dotty" Sandidge, Julia Harris, Carl Bolyer, and Sylvia Y. Davis, standing in interior with long lace curtains for Davis fourth wedding anniversary, another version
